nhc_headline: ...SARA IN THE GULF OF HONDURAS SLIDING TOWARDS BELIZE... ...LIFE-THREATENING CATASTROPHIC FLOODING AND MUDSLIDES CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
summary:
...SARA IN THE GULF OF HONDURAS SLIDING TOWARDS BELIZE... ...LIFE-THREATENING CATASTROPHIC FLOODING AND MUDSLIDES CONTINUE OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 3:00 PM CST Sat Nov 16
 the center of Sara was located near 16.4, -87.0
 with movement W at 5 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.
